translation.select_file_to_hash: Bitte wählen Sie eine Datei aus
translation.click_to_download: Klicken Sie auf das Symbol, um die Datei herunterzuladen

need_receipt.sub: No public proof receipt found at Woleet: you must provide one to verify this file

file_matched_but_anchor_not_yet_processe.main: No public proof found at Woleet
file_matched_but_anchor_not_yet_processe.sub: No public proof receipt found at Woleet: you must provide one to verify this file

target_hash_mismatch.sub: The proof receipt's target hash attribute doesn't match the file hash

unable_to_parse_json.sub: The file you provided is not a valid Chainpoint 1 or 2 proof receipt

merkle_root_mismatch.sub: The proof receipt's merkle root attribute does not match the proof result

non_sha256_target_proof_element.sub: An attribute in the proof (parent or left or right) in not a SHA256 hash

invalid_parent_in_proof_element.sub: A parent in the proof is not the SHA256 of its children

invalid_receipt_format.sub: The proof receipt does not conform to the Chainpoint 1 or 2 format

invalid_target_proof.sub: The proof receipt's merkle proof attribute is invalid

op_return_mismatches_merkle_root.sub: The transaction's OP_RETURN mismatches the proof receipt's merkle root

http_error.sub: An unexpected HTTP error occurred during the verification process

tx_not_found.sub: The proof receipt's transaction doesn't exist in the blockchain

tx_not_confirmed.sub: The proof receipt's transaction is not yet confirmed by the blockchain

invalid_receipt_signature.sub: Die Signatur des Korrekturbelegs ist für die Attribute signsHash und pubKey nicht gültig

invalid_receipt_signature_format.sub: Der Beleg entspricht nicht dem Chainpoint 1- oder 2-Format mit Signaturerweiterung

file_too_big_to_be_hashed_without_worker.sub: Die Datei ist zu groß, um ohne Arbeiter gehasht zu werden
